item.title: Emacs winner-mode to restore your window layouts
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (whatacold)
item.description: If you've been using Emacs for a while, I bet you must have encountered the annoying problem that your Emacs window layout gets messed up by some operations, such as looking for a help (e.g. C-h k), or checking things in magit.
